||[http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=528&macID=890 '''0-2'''] ||[http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=795&grupID=2&hafta=11#grp '''11''']||4 |} ===Classification group=== Classification group 2 was played with 8 teams remaining after top two of ranking group were promoted to promotion group. Top team in the group promoted to promotion play-offs, while bottom two teams relegated to [[TFF Third League]] [[TFF Third League 2007-08|2007-08]] season.[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/0607/B.html Turkish-Soccer Lig b 2006-07] Points and goals were carried from ranking group. MÄ°Y obtained 2 wins, 8 draws and 4 losses and finished third. Therefore MÄ°Y couldn't had a chance to promote to [[TFF Second League]] [[TFF Second League 2007-08|2007-08]].
